cards.title: Calderoch
setup: At the start of the game, put {Calderoch}'s villain character cards into play, 'Black Wind Rising' side up.
Search the villain deck for 3 relic cards and put them into play. Shuffle the villain deck. Flip the top card of the villain deck face up.
gameplay: At the start of the villain turn, if the storm pool has 3 or more tokens, flip {Calderoch}'s character card.
Otherwise, add 1 token to the storm pool.
cards.advanced: Reduce damage dealt to relics by 1.
flippedGameplay: At the start of the villain turn, add 1 token to the storm pool. You may play the top card of the villain deck to remove 2 cards from the storm pool.

Whenever an elemental, zombie, demon, or chosen is played from the top of the villai ndeck, search the villain deck and trash for all other cards with the same keyword and put them into play. Shuffle the villain deck.

At the end of the villain turn, {Calderoch} deals the {H - 1} hero targets with the highest HP X projectile damage each, where X is the number of tokens in the storm pool minus 2. Tf Forsaken Crusader is in the villain trash, put it into play. If a villain card was not played this turn, destroy {H} hero ongoing and/or equipment cards.
cards.flippedAdvanced: When {Calderoch} flips to this side, add 2 tokens to the storm pool.

cards.title: Autumn's Torment
body: When this card enters play, destroy all environment cards.
Whenever a hero plays a card, this card deals them 2 lightning damage.

flavorQuotes.text: My time has come again.{BR}Yours is ended.

cards.title: Avatar of Death
body: At the start of the villain turn, destroy 1 hero ongoing card.
Reduce damage dealt to this card by 1.
At the end of the villain turn, this card deals each hero target {H} projectile damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Looks like he's decided{BR}to get those claws dirty.

cards.title: Forsaken Crusader
body: At the start of the villain turn, play the top card of the villain deck.
At the end of the villain turn, this card deals the 2 hero targets with the highest HP {H - 2} melee damage each.

flavorQuotes.text: Brother...I can't breathe. I can't end.

cards.title: Gallows Blast
body: {Celadroch} deals each hero 5 infernal damage. Each player discards a card.
Reduce damage dealt to villain targets by 2 until the start of the villain turn.

flavorQuotes.text: The slopes of the dark mountain are{BR}full of those who have come before us.

cards.flavorReference: The Knight, Roots of the Underworld #17

cards.title: Grasping Breath
body: Play this card next to the hero with the most cards in hand. That hero cannot draw cards.
At the end of the villain turn, this card deals the hero next to it {H} psychic damage.
cards.flavorText: A tendril of white crept{BR}between the dried lips, with a sound{BR}like distant sighing. Then the corpse's{BR}eyes snapped open.
cards.flavorReference: with a sound like distant sighing. Then the corpse's eyes snapped open.

cards.title: Hollow Angel
body: At the end of the villain turn, this card deals each hero target 2 radiant damage.
When Tattered devil is dealt damage, it becomes immune to damage until this card is dealt damage or leaves play.

flavorQuotes.text: You've met with a{BR}terrible fate, haven't you?

cards.flavorReference: Lady of the Wood,{BR}Full Moon Masquerade #24

cards.title: Hours 'Til Dawn
body: When this card enters play, play the top card of the villain deck.
At the end of the villain turn, each villain target regains 2HP.
When this card is destroyed, {Celadroch} regains 10HP.

flavorQuotes.text: I thought he was stuck{BR}in a mountain somewhere.

cards.title: Laughing Hag
body: At the end of the villain turn, destroy 1 hero ongoing or equipment card.
This card is immune to fire, lightning, cold, and toxic damage.
Increase damage dealt to hero targets by 1.

flavorQuotes.text: I do not feel weather,{BR}or sunshine, or pain. You do.

cards.title: Leeching Breath
body: Play this card next to the hero with the highest HP. That hero cannot use powers.
At the end of the villain turn, this card deals the hero next to it {H} toxic damage.

cards.title: Lingering Exhalation
body: When this card enters play, play the top card of the villain deck.
Destroy this card when {Celadroch} is dealt 16 damage in a single round.
When this card is destroyed, put all targets from the villain trash into play.

cards.title: Lord of the Midnight Revel
body: The first time another villain target would be dealt damage each turn, this card deals the source of that damage {H} melee damage.
When this card is destroyed, destroy 1 hero ongoing or equipment card for each other non-character villain target in play.

flavorQuotes.text: Even during his{BR}imprisonment, his power seeped into{BR}the world and found servants for him.

cards.flavorReference: Lady of the Wood, Temple of the{BR}Four Winds #1

cards.title: Night under the Mountain
body: When this card enters play, play the top card of the villain deck.
At the start of the villain turn, destroy this card.
When this card is destroyed, increase damage dealt by villain targets by 2 until the end of the villain turn.

cards.title: Pillar of Night
body: This card may not regain HP. Reduce damage dealt to {Celadroch} by 1.
For every {H + 1} HP this card loses, including when it reaches 0HP, 1 player may immediately draw a card. When this card would leave play, remove it from the game.

cards.title: Pillar of Sky
body: This card may not regain HP. Reduce damage dealt to {Celadroch} by 1.
For every {H + 1} HP this card loses, including when it reaches 0HP, 1 hero may immediately use a power. When this card would leave play, remove it from the game.

cards.title: Pillar of Storms
body: This card may not regain HP. Reduce damage dealt to {Celadroch} by 1.
For every {H + 1} HP this card loses, including when it reaches 0HP, 1 player may immediately play a card. When this card would leave play, remove it from the game.

cards.title: Rattling Wind
body: When this card enters play, play the top card of the villain deck.
Whenever a hero draws a card, {Celadroch} deals them 1 projectile damage.
When this card is destroyed, {Celadroch} deals each hero target 1 cold damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Limbs flailing, feet flying,{BR}bones dancing to his desire.

cards.flavorReference: Lord of the Midnight Revel, Roots of the{BR}Underworld #30

cards.title: Screaming Gale
body: When this card enters play, play the top card of the villain deck.
Increase damage dealt by villain targets by 1.

flavorQuotes.text: A night of noise and black{BR}revelry, before the eternal stillness.

cards.title: Spring's Atrophy
cards.body: At the end of the villain turn, this card deals the hero target with the lowest HP {H - 1} toxic damage.

flavorQuotes.text: As the Lady wanes, even the{BR}seasons come under death's sway.

cards.title: Summer's Wrath
body: At the end of the villain turn, this card deals each hero target 2 fire damage.
This card is immune to damage unless another villain target has been dealt damage this turn.

flavorQuotes.text: I have seen plenty of{BR}death. But nothing like this.

cards.title: Tattered Devil
body: At the end of the villain turn, this card deals each hero target 2 infernal damage.
When Hollow Angel is dealt damage, it becomes immune to damage until this card is dealt damage or leaves play.

flavorQuotes.text: What's the priority here: the fact{BR}that the city is floating, or the army of{BR}monsters coming out of the mountain?

cards.title: The Mountain's Madness
body: Shuffle all targets from the villain trash into the villain deck.
Play the top card of the villain deck.
cards.flavorText: When the temple broke, scattered{BR}pieces of the death god's essence{BR}simultaneously recalled their single, terrible purpose.

cards.title: Whispering Breath
body: Play this card next to the hero with the most cards in play. That hero cannot play cards.
At the end of the villain turn, this card deals the hero next to it {H} sonic damage.

flavorQuotes.text: I see you have breathed{BR}life into your own champion. But{BR}once before, he belonged to my realm.

cards.title: Winter's Bane
body: Reduce damage dealt to villain cards by 1.
At the end of the villain turn, this card deals the hero target with the highest HP {H} cold damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Our agent performed{BR}admirably. The black god is free.
